title: Why is Navi Mumbai airport not complete yet?
selftext:
How is Adani as a contractor not blacklisted from bidding yet? 

He has not completed the navi Mumbai airport and as far as I know he received a 12770 crore underwriting on it almost 2 years ago?

What has been done since then? There was a goal of getting 1 plane out by 2023. How is this project 
still pending in 2024?

Talk is talk, actually finishing the work of contracts you get is a whole different thing. If I hear Adani win one more contract I'm gonna lose my mind.


https://www.thehindu.com/business/Industry/sbi-underwrites-the-entire-debt-of-12770-crore-of-adanis-navi-mumbai-airport/article65271859.ece
comments: either politics around who'll take the credit, or money
